metadata.title: CVE-2024-52332 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:igb: Fix potential invalid memory access in igb_init_module()The pci_register_driver() can fail and when this happened, the dca_notifierneeds to be unregistered, otherwise the dca_notifier can be called whenigb fails to install, resulting to invalid memory access.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
